_source.short_desc: The only event platform specifically designed to decrease stress and save you time. Plus 24/7 human support is included!
_source.long_desc: The only event platform specifically designed to decrease stress and save you time. Drive engagement and measurable ROI while organizing everything within one platform. Our premise is that technology should make your life easier so that you can focus on creating unique experiences.
_source.target_audience: Virtual, Hybrid, and In-Person events of all types and sizes!

related_products.short_desc: Organizers of events of all sizes use Eventbrite to power their live experience.
related_products.features: Eventbrite is a ticketing and event technology platform that helps businesses organize and sell tickets to events online  while helping people discover events that fuel their passions. From workshops to concerts to conferences to world-renowned film and music festivals, Eventbrite houses events of all shapes and sizes. Eventbrites powerful platform, which can be accessed online or via mobile apps, scales from basic registration and ticketing to a fully featured event management platform.

related_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.
related_products.features: GoTo Webinar is trusted by more customers than any other online webinar solution and powers millions of webinars each year. Whether you use webinars for marketing, training, or corporate communications, GoTo Webinar puts the fun back into webinars with reliable technology that's super simple to use. Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

related_products.short_desc: Airtable is the database that anyone can use with a beautiful spreadsheet interface.
related_products.features: Airtable is the relational database for the rest of us. With a spreadsheet-like interface that anyone can use, realtime collaboration, and rich features like file attachments and reporting, Airtable is the friendliest modern database.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based software with event app, event registration, event marketing, and event management for in-person/virtual/hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Whova is an all-in-one event management solution that consists of an award winning event app, efficient online registration, powerful event marketing, and time-saving event management tools. 
Whova has won the Event Technology Award for 5 years in a row and has powered over 30,000 in-person and virtual/hybrid events for all kinds of organizations in over 100 countries, including American Express, Microsoft, Hilton, Lego, IKEA, L'Oreal, American Marketing Association, Harvard University, and NASA

related_products.short_desc: A complete event marketing and management platform that handles the entire event lifecycle (in-person & virtual) from start to finish.
related_products.features: Cvent delivers an all-in-one event platform for any event, and every event. Our platform simplifies the management of each stage of the event lifecycle while giving you the data and insights you need to maximize your value. Whether in-person, virtual, or hybrid, you'll have a single platform with everything you need to find suppliers, engage attendees, maximize sponsor value, and capture important event data.

related_products.short_desc: A number of companies use Bitrix24 as free event management software, since it comes with all the necessary tools for the job.
related_products.features: A number of companies use Bitrix24 as free event management software, since it comes with all the necessary tools for the job. First, there is CRM and client management module that lets you create quotes and invoices, send emails and manage vendors. Second there are shared calendars that let you schedule and book multiple venues. Third, there?s a project management module and task templates that organizers use to manage ground crews.

related_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage your event business: proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
related_products.features:
HoneyBook makes it easy for event managers to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid-all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

related_products.short_desc: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues.
related_products.features: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues that will increase sales and streamline the booking process. It is the first web-based system created by hospitality event managers for hospitality event managers. Since 2008 Tripleseat has taken the restaurant business by storm providing solutions and simplifying the event process from start to finish. Over 2,500 venues and 18,000+ event industry expert trust Tripleseat.

related_products.short_desc: Create a beautiful event website in minutes. Trusted by more than 300,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike and MIT.
related_products.features:
Create a beautiful event website in minutes. 

Build an event website, collect registrations, sell tickets, send invites, track attendees, and promote your event online. Reliable and secure. 

Trusted by more than 500,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike, MIT and Refinery29.

related_products.short_desc: The eSPACE Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market!
related_products.features:
eSPACE has best-in-class customer service and ongoing development support, Our Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market! Some of our key features includes:

- Work Orders and Assignments & Inventory Control
- Robust Reporting Options & Equipment Tracking
- Preventive Maintenance
- Vendor Portal

Take us on a free test drive for 30 days or request a free demo today!

related_products.short_desc: Event management software for fundraising including silent auctions, live auctions, online bidding, mobile bidding & more!
related_products.features: Simple, Affordable, Powerful software for in person, hybrid or virtual events.  Supports live auctions, paper or online/mobile silent auction bidding, custom ticketing, seating management, custom color branding, donation bundling with multiple high resolution photos, guest self-checkout, monetary donations, marketing communications, detailed reporting, sponsor recognition and more. Our best in class customer service is FREE via phone or email. We're here to help!

similar_products.short_desc: Hearty technology, lightweight package. We combine serious event management software with a platform designed for regular humans.
similar_products.features: Swoogo is the #1 event management software that empowers event organizers to run effective in-person, virtual, and hybrid events. We provide a platform that creates a satisfying experience for you to build ROI positive events on repeat for your attendees. Our platform includes UNLIMITED events & registrations , personalized registration flows, built-in attendee analytics, seamless CRM and payment integrations, website+email marketing tools with automation, & best-in-class customer support.

similar_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.
similar_products.features: GoTo Webinar is trusted by more customers than any other online webinar solution and powers millions of webinars each year. Whether you use webinars for marketing, training, or corporate communications, GoTo Webinar puts the fun back into webinars with reliable technology that's super simple to use. Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Webex Events (formerly Socio) powers flexible, end-to-end virtual, in-person and hybrid event experiences.
similar_products.features: Webex Events (formerly Socio) is the end-to-end event management & experience platform powering immersive, intuitive, and inclusive virtual, hybrid, and in-person events. With features like registration, ticketing, schedules, live streaming, & simulive; attendee engagement tools like games, polls, chat, & sponsorship showcase; and in-person products like onsite check-in & badge printing, lead retrieval & live display.

similar_products.short_desc: A complete event marketing and management platform that handles the entire event lifecycle (in-person & virtual) from start to finish.
similar_products.features: Cvent delivers an all-in-one event platform for any event, and every event. Our platform simplifies the management of each stage of the event lifecycle while giving you the data and insights you need to maximize your value. Whether in-person, virtual, or hybrid, you'll have a single platform with everything you need to find suppliers, engage attendees, maximize sponsor value, and capture important event data.

similar_products.short_desc: From budget planning to event registration and coordinating with vendors, monday marketer can handle your entire event operation.
similar_products.features: From budget planning to event registration and coordinating with vendors, monday marketer can handle your entire event operation. Monitor event registration, encourage cross team collaboration, track performance and attendance with customizable dashboards and more.  Assign jobs to different colleagues so everyone knows exactly what to do in what priority. From pre-event registration to post-event feedback, organizations can monitor conferences, company events, webinars and more in real-time.

similar_products.short_desc: Event management suite with registration, ratings, mobile app, payments, speaker mgmt, space layout, and more. Live & virtual events.
similar_products.features: AWARD-WINNING PLATFORM. Flat, predictable pricing. All features all of the time. Unlimited events including VIRTUAL events. Unlimited users. No credit card fees. Modern and easy to use for event hosts and attendees. Website creation, customized registration, free web-based mobile app, session ratings, speaker ratings, payment processing, speaker/agenda management, space layout, CEU's, etc.   Flexible configuration options serve virtually any event business model.  Rated tops by Capterra!

similar_products.short_desc: Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management team
similar_products.features:
Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management teams worldwide. Founded in 1996, eShow has helped Event Managers run thousands of events worldwide with tasks including registration, mobile apps, event websites, RFID, badge printing, abstract collection and so much more! 

When you choose the eShow product(s) that fit your needs, you tap into a powerful engine that no single-function supplier can hope to match.

similar_products.short_desc: Build every in-person, virtual, and hybrid event with Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform - The Event Experience OS.
similar_products.features: Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform powers immersive in-person, virtual, and hybrid experiences for the world's leading brands. The Bizzabo Event Experience OS is a data-rich open platform that empowers Event Experience Leaders to manage events, engage audiences, activate communities, and deliver powerful business outcomes.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage your portfolio of meetings and events with ease, whether online, hybrid, or in-person; paid or free; private or public.
similar_products.features:
Attendease is an award-winning event management software used by mid-market/ enterprise organizations to manage a portfolio of meetings and events from end-to-end, whether online, hybrid, or in-person; paid or free; private or public.

Used by names such as Adobe, NBC, and Autodesk, our versatile software simplifies the complexity of managing events with a powerful suite of tools that ensures all details are addressed, changes are simple, and repetitive tasks are automated.

similar_products.short_desc: Sell tickets online and host your most successful event ever with TicketSpice.
similar_products.features:
Host your most successful event ever with TicketSpice. 

TicketSpice is easy to use, highly customizable, and unbelievably affordable. At just $0.99 per ticket, you'll save thousands, while offering a seamlessly simple ticketing experience. 

TicketSpice is flexible and feature rich, offering full branding control, timed ticketing, reserved seating, mobile scanning, box office, merchandise options, and more. 

If you're frustrated by expensive and restrictive ticketing systems that put their log

similar_products.short_desc: SpotMe is an event engagement solution tailored for companies looking to host high-touch events.
similar_products.features: SpotMe is an event engagement solution tailored for companies looking to host high-touch events. All event management, video production and app building tools are included, directly from your browser. The solution is suitable for simple webinars to sophisticated events with high production values. Forrester and G2 say SpotMe is a leader due to high engagement capabilities and deep customization and flexibility.

similar_products.short_desc: A comprehensive event management software that empowers organizers to plan, promote, and run online and in-person events.
similar_products.features: Zoho Backstage is all-in-one event management software to plan and run in-person, virtual, and hybrid event experiences from beginning to end with greater efficiency and impact. Right from designing an event website, selling tickets, and marketing an event, to communicating with attendees, presenting sessions, and analyzing an event's performance, Zoho Backstage has everything you need to grow your event and accelerate its success.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Catering software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Catering tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Catering software manages business functions for the catering, event planning, and banquet management industries. Catering software provides an integrated solution for coordinating essential business processes including client details, locations, scheduling, inventory management, menu planning, waitstaff coordination, and payroll, as well as marketing and budgeting functions. Catering tools can include document management functionality to help track proposals, deposits, contracts, and client histories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Conference software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Conference tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Conference software automates promotion, registration, and organization of live or online conferences.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Check In software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Check In tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Check In software helps significantly speed up the check in process at conferences, performances, and other events. This type of software can be deployed on mobile devices, such as smartphones and tablets, as well as kiosks, and often provides badge printing capabilities. Many organizations use Event Check In software to capture attendee information for lead generating purposes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Streaming software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Streaming tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Streaming software allows organizations to broadcast live event feeds over the internet and engage with their target audience.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Meeting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Meeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Meeting software enables teams to coordinate, schedule, conduct, and participate in collaborative meetings.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Event Apps software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Event Apps tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Event Apps enable event organizers to consistently distribute important event information to the attendees in real time and facilitate networking among attendees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Registration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Registration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Registration software automates the process of registering for conferences, meetings, classes, and other events. These applications offer a customizable solution for attendance tracking and event or meeting registration tasks. They also provide tools for processing payments either in advance or onsite, as well as donation collection and volunteer coordination features. Registration solutions also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery, and fee payment. Registration software is related to Event Management software and Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Ticketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Ticketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Ticketing software manages and automates online, kiosk, and box office ticketing for special events, theaters, parks, festivals, fairs, travel, and other activities. These applications help manage seat selections, event management, exhibitor data, performer assignments and locations, as well as online and onsite payment processing. Ticketing solutions also often integrate other business processes such as inventory control, transaction control, fulfillment history and sales tracking. Ticketing software is related to Event software, Registration software and Kiosk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Venue Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Venue Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Venue Management solutions aim to help event planners with marketing and scheduling of their facilities, ensuring that appropriate services and resources are provided for each event, and that the facility's capacity is optimally utilized.

_source.short_desc: Accelevents is an all-in-one events platform that empowers you to expand your reach and drive sustainable growth.
_source.long_desc:
Accelevents is an all-in-one event management platform for in-person, virtual & hybrid events. Built to save you time and frustration while delivering measurable results for your organization. 

As a leading event technology platform, Accelevents is redefining the way brands connect with their audiences with a user-friendly yet robust set of customizable and interactive features.
_source.target_audience: Virtual, Hybrid, and In-Person events of all types and sizes!

media.caption: Host multiple simultaneous breakout sessions to engage your audience.
Watch, connect, and engage during a main stage session! This is where you can showcase a keynote, opening remarks, and more.
Browse through the virtual exhibit hall and view demos, download collateral, and book appointments.
Let attendees choose their schedule from the event agenda!
Browse the attendee list and send a connection request for 1:1 networking, or join a lounge!

category_features.name: Absentee Bidding
category_features.definition: A tool that allows bidders to bid on an upcoming auction item prior to the beginning of the auction

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Bid Management
category_features.definition: Share bid details, archive bids, and create bid requests to assist in bid solicitation and quote comparison

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Buy Now Option
category_features.definition: In addition to the traditional bidding process in an auction, add the option for bidders to buy the item immediately

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Live Auction
category_features.definition: An auction that takes place in real time in front of a group of bidders

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Online Auction
category_features.definition: Host, facilitate and manage a virtual auction online in which participants and members can buy, sell or bid items

category_features.name: Online Bidding
category_features.definition: Allows for auction participants and potential buyers to bid for items virtually from anywhere

category_features.name: Proxy Bidding
category_features.definition: Bidders set a maximum price they?d pay for an item and bids are placed in small increments until that price or until the item is sold

category_features.name: Reverse Bidding
category_features.definition: Sellers bid for the prices of which they are willing to sell their items

category_features.name: Silent Auction
category_features.definition: An auction in which bidders write down their bids on a sheet of paper

category_features.name: Watch List
category_features.definition: Allows participants to watch, see and track activity related to an item or bid

category_features.name: Website Management
category_features.definition: Website builder or integration with 3rd party site

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Vendor Management
category_features.definition: Ability to track and store all vendor-related information, such as contacts, services offered, terms, etc.

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

category_features.name: Fundraising Management
category_features.definition: Activities related to raising money for a specific cause

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

category_features.name: Activities Booking
category_features.definition: Allows businesses to offer customers reservations for a variety of activities.

category_features.name: Booking Notes
category_features.definition: Keep notes on the specifics of a reservation including customer information and special requests

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Customer Support
category_features.definition: Provide online support for your customers through live chat or help desk functionality

category_features.name: Group Reservations
category_features.definition: The ability to reserve times in groups.

category_features.name: Promotions Management
category_features.definition: Design, communicate, and distribute incentives to perform a specific action

category_features.name: Rate Management
category_features.definition: Track/optimize rates in relation to usage

category_features.name: Room Booking
category_features.definition: Reserve available meeting space to avoid conflicts and  to inform everyone involved on where their meetings will be held

category_features.name: Third Party Booking
category_features.definition: Allows bookings to be made through a third party service.

category_features.name: Barcode / Ticket Scanning
category_features.definition: The ability to scan barcodes to ensure accurate pricing and label tracking

category_features.name: Concessions Management
category_features.definition: The ability to purchase food/ beverage/ souvenirs

category_features.name: Customer Data Management
category_features.definition: Searchable repository of information about clients

category_features.name: Employee Management
category_features.definition: Tracks employee schedules, availability, performance

category_features.name: Kiosk Ticketing
category_features.definition: Obtain tickets via Kiosk upon arrival at event

category_features.name: Mobile Ticketing
category_features.definition: Gain access to event through mobile device

category_features.name: Online Ticketing
category_features.definition: Gain access to event via the web

category_features.name: Onsite Ticketing
category_features.definition: Gain access to event via reservation holder at event

category_features.name: Point of Sale (POS)
category_features.definition: Accept and process financial transactions for tickets

category_features.name: Print-at-Home
category_features.definition: The ability to print tickets before arriving

category_features.name: Promotions Management
category_features.definition: Track and offer promotional ticketing prices

category_features.name: Season Tickets
category_features.definition: Grants the users access to all events for one season

category_features.name: Seating Map
category_features.definition: For selection of seat at booking or check-in

category_features.name: Ticket Brokering
category_features.definition: The resale of tickets based on demand and availability

category_features.name: Ticket Reservations
category_features.definition: Create and manage reservations

category_features.definition: Website builder or integration with 3rd party site

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Customer Management
category_features.definition: Capture and analyze information about your customers and interactions with them

category_features.name: Reservations Management
category_features.definition: Create and manage reservations

related_products.short_desc: Bloomerang's donor management software helps fundraisers save more time, raise more funds, and do more good.
related_products.features:
Bloomerang helps nonprofits deliver a better giving experience so they can save time, raise more funds, and create lasting change. With our donor management software, you'll have access to: 

- Email Marketing Tools
- Letters & Mailings Templates
- An Integrations Hub
- Online Giving Pages & Forms
- Peer-to-Peer Fundraising Tools
- Reporting & Analytics
- Automatic Data Updates

related_products.short_desc: DonorPerfect empowers your team to work together, raise more money, and cultivate relationships that keep your mission moving forward.
related_products.features: Nonprofits raise 20% more funds in their first year using DonorPerfect. It's the most comprehensive solution in fundraising. Manage donations, contacts, receipting, reporting, email, and fundraising initiatives from a single system. With automatic monthly giving, integrated online donation forms, standard and custom reports, Constant Contact email, auction management, and a network of integrated partner solutions, DonorPerfect is ideal for organizations of all sizes.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: With QuickBooks Online Advanced you can organize your books, complete tasks that matter faster with automated approvals and reminders, and stay on top of your cash flow. With the revenue streams dashboard, you can understand which fundraisers and donors are strongest and which need help. You can also create board-ready presentations intuitively. With 24/7 premium care, get the support you need.

related_products.short_desc: Church management software with membership, contributions, attendance, visitation, picture/portrait, and more.
related_products.features:
Too many programs make fund-raising complicated. Fund-raising should be fun, simple, and easily managed.  If people want to know where they are with their giving and how much they owe, this should be a simple thing to report.  Servant Keeper makes it so easy!

Join the 30,000+ non-profits that have discovered the secret to simplifying fund-raising while increasing donations.

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of small nonprofits rely on Network for Good's simple and smart fundraising software to cultivate relationships with donors a
related_products.features:
Reach your fundraising goals, connect with supporters, and advance your mission with Network for Good's all-in-one fundraising software.

Built for small and growing nonprofits, only Network for Good is designed to help you become a better fundraiser.

Get donor management, powerful communication tools, online fundraising features, and more-all in one integrated software. Plus, our best-in-class onboarding, customer service, and data migration are always included.

related_products.short_desc: Neon CRM is the leading all-in-one fundraising & donation software on the market. Raise more and increase your organization's impact.
related_products.features:
Our fully-branded forms allow you to integrate any fundraising campaign seamlessly with your website at no additional cost. 

With Neon CRM, you can manage donors, campaigns, events, volunteers - your whole operation out of a single, unified software. Our relationship-focused approach to software ensures that your organization's personal touch is never lost - but time consuming manual work is.

Over 3,000 organizations are raising more with Neon CRM. Ready for a better fundraising tool?

related_products.short_desc: GiveGab is the #1 digital fundraising solution for Giving Days and year-round giving. Experience the JOY of fundraising with GiveGab!
related_products.features:
GiveGab is becoming Bonterra. Learn more at www.bonterratech.com.

GiveGab is the #1 digital solution for Giving Days and year-round fundraising tailored to nonprofit networks, community foundations, education institutions, hospital foundations, and public media outlets. GiveGab provides a modern and secure platform built on technology inspired by the feedback of our customers, resulting in products and features tailored to the most popular requests of our partners.

related_products.short_desc: Auctria: a budget friendly web solution to run your entire event from tickets to receipts; traditional auctions or online fundraisers.
related_products.features: Auctria makes live, silent, online, virutal, hybrid auction & event fundraisers easy & affordable for groups large and small. Handle ticket sales, bids, purchases & donations. Track donors & items.  Produce printed forms as needed. Integrated credit card processing optional & accept online donations. Mobile and text-based bidding available. Completely transparent pricing with no performance fees. Explore our demo or get started with a free account to try it out.

related_products.short_desc: Fundraising solution that helps you communicate with your constituents and make better decisions.
related_products.features: Raisers Edge NXT is a smart, cloud fundraising solution built to help nonprofits achieve sustainable growth. It's a total solution that includes all the tools needed to be successful on one platform and one simple subscription price. This includes data enrichment services, event management, and social and email marketing tools, online donations, flexible reporting and actionable analytics.  Raisers Edge NXT pulls together your processes and people to move your entire mission forward.

related_products.short_desc: Event management software for charitable fundraising including silent auctions, live auctions, online bidding, mobile bidding & more!
related_products.features: Simplify every aspect of running your charitable event!  Sell tickets, Online, Mobile and paper-based bidding options. Manage contacts, track donations, create auction bundles and printed material.  Eliminate check-in / check-in lines, store credit cards, write thank you letters and more.  Simple, affordable and powerful event management software for any charitable organization including Schools, Churches, Community Service Organizations.  Night of your event support, video tutorials and more.

related_products.short_desc: Online donation platform & fundraising software for nonprofits. Includes donation forms, mass email, SMS, QB integration, and more.
related_products.features: Discover why thousands of nonprofits have trusted DonorSnap for over a decade. DonorSnap is an all-in-one fundraising software for nonprofits. Save countless administrative hours with time-saving tools and integrations. Take your fundraising to the next level with robust reporting and communication tools. Pricing starts at $39 per month. Try DonorSnap with your own data risk-free for 30 days.

similar_products.short_desc: EveryAction - a unified nonprofit CRM solution built to increase efficiency, optimize multichannel fundraising, & advance your mission.
similar_products.features: Get more from and do more with your donor data. EveryAction's unified CRM and nonprofit fundraising software gives you a 360-degree view of your donors, empowering you to run automated, personalized, omni-channel fundraising campaigns by managing online and offline fundraising from the same, powerful platform. With best-in-class fundraising, membership, advocacy and analytics tools built and supported by nonprofit experts, EveryAction enables organizations of all sizes to advance their missions.

similar_products.short_desc: GradAdvance by Graduway is the leading digital fundraising solution to manage giving days, crowdfunding, and annual campaigns.
similar_products.features: GradAdvance by Graduway is a leading provider of digital fundraising solutions. Proven to be effective for giving days, crowdfunding, and annual campaigns, Graduway's full suite of tools enhance your efforts for more impactful outcomes, attracting more donors and raising more dollars.

similar_products.short_desc: Eleo is designed with new and seasoned fundraisers in mind.
similar_products.features:
Eleo is designed for new and seasoned fundraisers. Complete with every feature, integration, and report you need to build strong relationships with your donors. Send effective communications and analyze your fundraising efforts.  Eleo comes equipped with event, volunteer, membership and grant modules.

Pricing starts at $39/month for up to 2,500 contacts and includes live support, trainings, data import, & more.

similar_products.short_desc: Neon CRM is the leading all-in-one fundraising & donation software on the market. Raise more and increase your organization's impact.
similar_products.features:
Our fully-branded forms allow you to integrate any fundraising campaign seamlessly with your website at no additional cost. 

With Neon CRM, you can manage donors, campaigns, events, volunteers - your whole operation out of a single, unified software. Our relationship-focused approach to software ensures that your organization's personal touch is never lost - but time consuming manual work is.

Over 3,000 organizations are raising more with Neon CRM. Ready for a better fundraising tool?

similar_products.short_desc: Givebutter is a free fundraising platform bringing together everything changemakers need to successfully raise funds for good causes.
similar_products.features: Givebutter is the #1 rated fundraising platform on G2, powering $300m+ in donations for more than a million changemakers worldwide. Nonprofits use Givebutter to replace multiple categories of tools, including donation forms, fundraisers, events, donor management (CRM), email, texting, and more. Instead of charging a traditional SaaS subscription fee, Givebutter is completely free to use with a 100% transparent tip-or-fee model. Givebutter has been certified as a Great Place to Work in 2022.

similar_products.short_desc: Fundraising Software offering: Online Giving | Virtual Fundraising | Peer-to-Peer | Event Management | Text2Give | Tributes & Memorials
similar_products.features:
OneCause fundraising software offers an intuitive, reliable and affordable solution. Providing the ability to manage multiple live or virtual fundraisers annually allowing any-sized organization to connect more donors to your cause.

Software offers: online giving | virtual fundraising | streaming video | peer-to-peer | tributes & memorial gifts | giving days | run, walk, rides | event management | online auctions & mobile bidding | reporting & analytics | online, phone & email support.

similar_products.short_desc:
Funraise provides digital fundraising tech to build your nonprofit's movement & make enterprise-size impact. 

Get started for Free!
similar_products.features:
Funraise provides exceptional, friendly digital fundraising technology. Built with innovation and nonprofit experience, Funraise's state-of-the-art fundraising tools integrate every critical aspect of fundraising management into a single platform, making it fun to create lasting impact with nonprofit-first technology. Experience why organizations like United Nations HCR and National Wildlife Federation trust Funraise to power their fundraising. 

Because your cause is our cause.

similar_products.short_desc: We offer a true all-in-one solution! Try our complete Online Giving, Donor Management, and Fund Accounting system for free.
similar_products.features: Nonprofits love Continue To Give because we offer a true all-in-one solution! We have the complete Online Giving, Donor Management, and Fund Accounting in one.  You'll raise more money with our Text, Mobile, App, Website, Social, and Peer to Peer Fundraising options. Plus, you are able to sell event tickets, build meaningful relationships, and more with our Donor Management System. Then, to top it off, you can drop your accounting software, because we built that too! Switch today and Save!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Donation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Donation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Donation Management software helps nonprofit organizations collect, track, and distribute funds contributed by their patrons, maintain donors' information, and connect with them during fundraising campaigns. Payment processing capabilities as well as contact management features are essential parts of this software. For related software solutions see Fundraising software, Grant Management software and Payment Processing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fund Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fund Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fund Accounting software automates accounting and portfolio management functions for nonprofit organizations, alternative asset managers, private bankers, foundations and government agencies. Fund administrators utilize these applications to assist in strategic decision making and to increase accountability across an organization's financial operations. Fund Accounting software also assists with regulatory compliance management and financial reporting on portfolio performance. Fund Accounting software is related to Accounting software and Government software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Political Campaign software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Political Campaign tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Political Campaign software provides financial and management tools, contribution tracking, a voter database, and other features to help political candidates and PACs more effectively manage campaigns. Campaign managers use these software applications to efficiently identify likely donors, target voters for outreach efforts, manage volunteers, track contributions, and assess the effectiveness of campaigns. Political Campaign software also typically offers demographic and voter behavior data, polling tools, call center integration and other campaign management necessities such as regulatory compliance monitoring. Political Campaign software is related to Fundraising software.
